extendedInfo.description: If you are looking for the Sneak Peeks and crazy wallpapers of One Direction's new Single "Best Song Ever"then you have landed to "the perfect App" !!>> Images of behind scenes and many moments of new track>> HD images which fits each n every phone>> sneak Peeks of One direction 2013One direction, the English boyband formed in 2010 along with Niall Horan ,Zayn Malik, Liam Payne, Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson.This is the spot for real one direction fans .check and enjoy amazing Niall Horan WallpapersSo just download this app and dive into the world of One Direction*||IMPORTANT||* Guys If the app unable to open in your set, try to free bit of memory and run again it will run !! Some sets require bit more memory to run this app !!P.S- We are small time developers ,so for monetizing and for keep making Exciting free apps for you this app is add-supported which can be opted out easily.Note:- This is not an official app and is subjected under copyright protection. In case any of the images violates any rights please let us know we'll remove the subjected contents immediately. Thank You.

reviews.title: HATE
reviews.comment: I downloded this app then went on it. There was no phots on it, there was exit, play images,  and more apps. I clickd exit nothing happend, I clicked play images nothing happend. This app is dumb :(
reviews.author: Paige Grace
